__e: Come on, it seems that you've never seen a man!

Once he saw his son, that was it.
That's the way he saw himself.
That sighting of the van was at one o'clock in the morning.
He only said he didn't see anybody but I think he knows, he's just not telling us.
He saw the body and said nothing.
Later that day, her brother crept in and saw the body.
So you didn't actually see the body?
So he looked in the car... then I ran this way, and..

He saw me at work, so I had to go and talk to him.
He doesn't say anything, but I know every time he looks at me, he's thinking about how he caught us in that car.
So, you saw her at the house.
So you never saw him last night?
So someone saw her at the house?
What did he see that's gone in me?
He was the first man who ever saw... something better in me than what I was.
I don't know what it was that he saw.
* Ever since we first saw the light *
And after talking to him you saw the light?
But all I do know is first she said she didn't see a face.
She didn´t see his face and he didn´t say anything.

She didn´t see his face and he didn´t say anything.

No, I just wanted to ask if you'd, by any chance, seen Mr Scott on the day he died?
